text.tspan: Intensity error, East Northern Pacific Basin Tropical Cyclones, 1990 to
Average forecasting error of the intensity of hurricanes and tropical cyclones from 24 hours to 120 hours in advance. Intensity
Data source: NHC, Hurricane Forecasting Error (2019)
